set_value.name: $DADVT.$DADynamicWarDisabledFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.buccaneers, faction.civilian, faction.criminal, faction.khaak, faction.player, faction.smuggler, faction.visitor, faction.xenon]

set_value.name: $DADVT.$DAJobsEXPFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.argon, faction.antigone, faction.paranid, faction.holyorder, faction.teladi, faction.split, faction.terran, faction.xenon]

set_value.name: $DADVT.$DAGodExcludedFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.civilian, faction.criminal, faction.khaak, faction.player, faction.smuggler, faction.visitor, faction.xenon]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DADynamicUniverse -- Critical -- md.$DADynamicVarTable was missing. Will result in reset of all settings.'
'MOD: DADynamicWar -- Not enough factions found to perform Dynamic War Script.'

debug_to_file.name: 'EventDynamicWarEventSelector'
debug_to_file.text: '%s -- ERROR -- Not enough factions found to perform Dynamic War Script.'.[player.age]

do_for_each.name: $DADynamicWarPossibleFaction
do_for_each.comment: Not sure why I like using $E today, must be tired

set_value.name: $DADynamicWarLocSelectedWeightValue
set_value.comment: Technically selected faction but have no clue who it is

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DADynamicWar -- ERROR SELECTING FACTIONTWO\n %s -- WeightStart: %s -- WeightEnd: %s -- SelectedWeight: %s'.[$DADynamicWarPossibleFaction,$DADynamicWarLocCurrentRange.{1},$DADynamicWarLocCurrentRange.{2},$DADynamicWarLocSelectedWeightValue]
'MOD: DADynamicWar -- Aborted Script. Not enough factions.'

debug_to_file.name: 'EventDynamicWarEventSelector'
debug_to_file.text: '%s -- ERROR -- Aborted Script. Not enough factions.'.[player.age]

set_value.name: $DARelFixLocExcludedFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.civilian, faction.criminal, faction.khaak, faction.player, faction.smuggler, faction.visitor, faction.xenon]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadAirDynamicWars -- Fixed relations between %s and %s. New relation is %s.'.[$DARelFixLocFactionOne.knownname,$DARelFixLocFactionTwo.knownname,$DARelFixLocFactionOne.relation.{$DARelFixLocFactionOne.relationto.{$DARelFixLocFactionTwo}}.uivalue]

'MOD: DeadAirDynamicWars -- Fixed relations between %s and %s. New relation is %s.'.[faction.ministry.knownname,$DARelFixLocOtherFaction.knownname,faction.ministry.relation.{faction.ministry.relationto.{$DARelFixLocOtherFaction}}.uivalue]

set_value.name: $DADynamicWarLocMilStrengthDebug
set_value.exact: '\n %s: %s -- ShipCount: %s -- MilStrength: %s -- SectorCount: %s -- MilComparisonValue: %s -- SectorComparisonValue: %s -- MilStrengthFactor: %s'.[$E,$DADynamicWarLocPossibleFaction,$DADynamicWarLocPossibleFactionMilShips.count,$DADynamicWarLocPossibleFactionMilStrength,$DADynamicWarLocPossibleFactionSectors.count,$DADynamicWarLocMilComparisonValue,$DADynamicWarLocSectorComparisonValue,$DADynamicWarLocMilStrengthFinal]

set_value.name: $DADynamicWarLocMiscDebug
set_value.exact: '\n %s: %s -- RaceValue: %s -- RelationValue: %s -- CommonEnemies: %s -- CommonFriends: %s -- CollectiveRelationValue: %s -- MiscModifier: %s'.[$E,$DADynamicWarLocPossibleFaction,$DADynamicWarLocRaceValue,$DADynamicWarLocRelationValue,$DADynamicWarLocCommonEnemies,$DADynamicWarLocCommonFriends,$DADynamicWarLocCollectiveRelationValue,$DADynamicWarLocPossibleFactionMiscModifier]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DADynamicWar -- Executed Relation Change -- $DADynamicWarLocWarEvent: %s -- $DADynamicWarFactionOne: %s -- $DADynamicWarFactionTwo: %s \n Old Relation: %s -- $DADynamicWarNewRelation: %s -- $DADynamicWarNewAbsoluteRepValue: %s -- Old + $DADynamicWarAbsoluteRepValueChange: %s'.[$DADynamicWarLocWarEvent,$DADynamicWarFactionOne,$DADynamicWarFactionTwo,$DADynamicWarOldRelation,$DADynamicWarNewRelation,$DADynamicWarNewAbsoluteRepValue,$DADynamicWarOldRelation + $DADynamicWarAbsoluteRepValueChange]

debug_to_file.name: 'LibraryDynamicWarEventExecute'
debug_to_file.text: '%s -- Event: %s -- %s and %s -- Relation Before: %s -- Relation After: %s'.[player.age,$DADynamicWarLocWarEvent,$DADynamicWarFactionOne,$DADynamicWarFactionTwo,$DADynamicWarOldRelation,$DADynamicWarNewRelation]

include_actions.comment: This was only separated into a library for readability

set_value.name: $DADVT.$DADynamicWarDisabledFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.civilian, faction.criminal, faction.khaak, faction.player, faction.smuggler, faction.visitor, faction.xenon]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DADynamicWar -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

set_value.comment: set in multiple places so the cue wont fire simultaneously

set_value.name: $DADynamicNewsLastReportTime

set_value.name: $DADynamicNewsLastReportTime
set_value.comment: set in multiple places so the cue wont fire simultaneously

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DADynamicNews -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- Placed %s Request -- ShipyardSector: %s -- JobMainSector: %s -- LocRequestedShip: %s -- $DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList.count: %s'.[this.$LocJobID,this.$LocSector.knownname,this.$LocJobMainZone.sector.knownname,this.$LocRequestedShip,@md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList.count]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- Xenon ship activated. Ship: %s(%s) -- Job: %s -- JobMainSector: %s -- Location: %s -- Total Ships Alive: %s -- Total Ships Built: %s'.[parent.$LocRequestedShip.knownname,parent.$LocRequestedShip.idcode,parent.$LocRequestedShip.job,parent.$LocRequestedShip.jobmainsector.knownname,parent.$LocRequestedShip.sector.knownname,md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup.count,@md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAEvolutionTotalShipsBuilt]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- Xenon ships active: %s -- Max Fleets %s'.[($DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonFleetJobNumbers.count + $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup.count + $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList.count),$DADVT.$DAEvolutionMaxXenonJobs]
'MOD: DAEvolution -- Selected Shipyard in: %s -- Selected Xenon sector: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocSelectedShipyard.sector.knownname,$DAEvolutionLocSelectedSector.knownname]
'MOD: DAEvolution -- Requested %s ship with gate -- ShipyardSector: %s -- JobMainSector: %s.'.[$LocEvoJob,$DAEvolutionLocSelectedSector.knownname,$DAEvolutionLocGate.sector.knownname]
'MOD: DAEvolution -- Requested %s ship with sector and zone -- ShipyardSector: %s -- JobMainSector: %s.'.[$LocEvoJob,$DAEvolutionLocSelectedSector.knownname,$DAEvolutionLocZone.sector.knownname]
'MOD: DAEvolution -- Xenon ships at or above max, skipping activation.'

'MOD: DAEvolution -- ERROR: Missing Var for Xenon Jobs. $DADVT.$DAEvolutionMaxXenonJobs %s -- $DAEvolutionXenonFleetSizeSmall %s -- $DAEvolutionXenonFleetSizeMedium %s -- $DAEvolutionXenonFleetSizeLarge %s'.[$DADVT.$DAEvolutionMaxXenonJobs,$DAEvolutionXenonFleetSizeSmall,$DAEvolutionXenonFleetSizeMedium,$DAEvolutionXenonFleetSizeLarge]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- LibraryEvolutionCheckOperationalShips: Add to $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup from $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList -- Ship: %s (%s) -- Job: %s -- Location: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocXShip.macro,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.idcode,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.job,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.sector.knownname]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- LibraryEvolutionCheckOperationalShips: Removing operational ship from temp list -- Ship: %s (%s) -- Job: %s -- Location: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocXShip.macro,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.idcode,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.job,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.sector.knownname]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- LibraryEvolutionCheckOperationalShips: Remove $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup from $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonFleetJobNumbers -- Ship: %s (%s) -- Job: %s -- Location: %s -- Subordinates: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocXShip.macro,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.idcode,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.job,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.sector.knownname,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.subordinates.count]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- LibraryEvolutionCheckOperationalShips: Add to $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup -- Ship: %s (%s) -- Job: %s -- Location: %s -- Subordinates: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocXShip.macro,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.idcode,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.job,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.sector.knownname,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.subordinates.count]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- LibraryEvolutionCheckOperationalShips: Remove $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup from $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList -- Ship: %s (%s) -- Job: %s -- Location: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocXShip.macro,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.idcode,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.job,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.sector.knownname]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- LibraryEvolutionCheckOperationalShips: Remove $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup from $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonFleetJobNumbers -- Ship: %s (%s) -- Job: %s -- Location: %s'.[$DAEvolutionLocXShip.macro,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.idcode,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.job,$DAEvolutionLocXShip.sector.knownname]

'MOD: DAEvolution -- Xenon ship count by variable -- $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup.count: %s -- $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonFleetJobNumbers.count: %s -- $DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList.count: %s'.[$DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipGroup.count,$DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonFleetJobNumbers.count,$DADVT.$DAEvolutionXenonShipTempList.count]
'MOD: DAEvolution -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]
'MOD: DAFill -- Completed station search and found %s stations'.[$DAFillLocStationGroup.count]

'MOD: DAFill -- BROKEN WEAPON -- WEAPON: %s -- $DAFillLocWeaponMacros.indexof.{$DAFillLocWeapon.macro}: %s -- GROUPTAG: %s -- HASWEAPONMOD: %s -- HASWEAPONMOD.{Weapon} %s'.[@$DAFillLocWeapon.macro,@$DAFillLocWeaponMacros.indexof.{$DAFillLocWeapon.macro},@$DAFillLocWeapon.grouptag,@$DAFillLocWeapon.hasweaponmod,@$DAFillLocWeapon.hasweaponmod.{$DAFillLocWeaponMod}]

'MOD: DAFill -- BROKEN WEAPON -- WEAPON: %s -- $DAFillLocWeaponMacros.indexof.{$DAFillLocWeapon.macro}: %s -- GROUPTAG: %s -- HASWEAPONMOD: %s -- HASWEAPONMOD.{Weapon} %s'.[@$DAFillLocWeapon.macro,@$DAFillLocWeaponMacros.indexof.{$DAFillLocWeapon.macro},@$DAFillLocWeapon.grouptag,@$DAFillLocWeapon.hasweaponmod,@$DAFillLocWeapon.hasweaponmod.{$DAFillLocWeaponMod}]
'MOD: DAFill -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

set_value.name: $LocDebug
set_value.exact: if event.param? then event.param else false

'MOD: DAJobsEXP -- No Shipyard Sector: %s %s %s -- order sector: %s.'.[$DAJobsEXPLocExpeditionShip.idcode,$DAJobsEXPLocExpeditionShip.knownname,$DAJobsEXPLocExpeditionShip.sector.knownname,$DAJobsEXPLocExpeditionShip.defaultorder.$space.knownname]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Started processing all sector tags.'

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- %s -- FOUND CORRECT JOB -- Tag: %s -- Job: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocTableFaction.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocDAContestedTag,$DAJobsSSTLocCorrectJob]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- %s -- FOUND CORRECT JOB -- Tag: %s -- Job: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocTableFaction.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocDALTraderTag,$DAJobsSSTLocCorrectJob]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Time to find all jobs: %s'.[(player.age - $DAJobsSSTFindJobsTime).formatted.default]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Time to activate all jobs: %s'.[(player.age - $DAJobsSSTActivateJobsTime).formatted.default]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Time to deactivate all jobs: %s'.[(player.age - $DAJobsSSTDeactivateJobsTime).formatted.default]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Total time of script run: %s'.[(player.age - $DAJobsSSTTimeScriptStarted).formatted.default]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Placed %s Request for %s -- $Sector: %s -- Job: %s -- LocRequestedShip: %s -- $PendingJobShips.count: %s -- $SectorsWithRequested.count: %s'.[this.$LocWhichTag,this.$LocFaction,this.$LocSector.knownname,this.$LocJobID,this.$LocRequestedShip,@md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAJobsSSTJobSizeQuotas.{this.$LocFaction}.{this.$LocWhichTag}.{6}.count,@md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAJobsSSTJobSizeQuotas.{this.$LocFaction}.{this.$LocWhichTag}.{8}.count]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- ERROR ADDING SHIP TO GROUP -- not md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAJobsSSTJobSizeQuotas.{$LocFaction}.{$LocWhichTag}.count -- $LocFaction: %s -- $LocWhichTag: %s -- $LocWhichTag.count: %s'.[@parent.$LocFaction,@parent.$LocWhichTag,@md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAJobsSSTJobSizeQuotas.{parent.$LocFaction}.{parent.$LocWhichTag}.count]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- %s has hostile stations in system. Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocHostileOccupied]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Time to process all sectors: %s'.[(player.age - $DAJobsSSTFindSectorsTime).formatted.default]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Added Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDACriticalTag,$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDACriticalTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Removed Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDACriticalTag,@$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDACriticalTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Added Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDACoreTag,$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDACoreTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Removed Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDACoreTag,@$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDACoreTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Added Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDABorderTag,$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDABorderTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Removed Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDABorderTag,@$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDABorderTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Sector: %s -- Faction: %s -- Added Tag: %s -- Verified: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.knownname,$DAJobsSSTLocFaction4,$DAJobsSSTLocDAContestedTag,$DAJobsSSTLocSector2.locationtags.indexof.{$DAJobsSSTLocDAContestedTag}]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Requested $CoreTag job ship for faction: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTOrderFaction.id]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Requested $BorderTag job ship for faction: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTOrderFaction.id]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Requested $ContestedTag job ship for faction: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTOrderFaction.id]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Requested $MTraderTag job ship for faction: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTOrderFaction.id]
'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Requested $LMinerTag job ship for faction: %s'.[$DAJobsSSTOrderFaction.id]

'MOD: DAJobsSST -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

set_value.name: $LocDebug
set_value.exact: if event.param? then event.param else false

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAGate -- Number of gates found: %s of %s.'.[$DAGateLocGates.count,$DAGateLocAllGates.count]
'MOD: DAGate -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

set_value.name: $LocDebug
set_value.exact: if event.param? then event.param else false

do_if.value: (typeof this.$LocWare == datatype.ware) and md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAGodFactionModuleQuotas.{this.$DAGodFaction}? and md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAGodFactionModuleQuotas.{this.$DAGodFaction}.{this.$LocWare}? and (md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAGodFactionModuleQuotas.{this.$DAGodFaction}.{this.$LocWare}.{2} gt 0)

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAGod -- Finished signalling EventGodDesignStation for %s -- Ware typed ordered: %s'.[this.$DAGodFaction.id,this.$DAGodWareTypesOrdered]

'MOD: DAGod -- Ordering Stations -- Faction: %s -- Ware: %s -- FullStations: %s -- ExpandedStations: %s -- PartialStations: %s -- TotalModules: %s'.[this.$DAGodLocFaction.id,this.$DAGodLocWare.id,this.$DAGodLocFullStations,this.$DAGodLocExpandedStations,this.$DAGodLocPartialStations,md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAGodFactionModuleQuotas.{this.$DAGodLocFaction}.{this.$DAGodLocWare}.{2}]

signal_cue_instantly.param: table[ $station = this.$DAGodLocFactory, $plannedmodules = this.$DAGodLocModules, $basesequence = this.$DAGodLocBaseSequence, $moduleset = this.$DAGodLocFactory.modulesets.{1}, $debugoutput = md.$DADynamicVarTable.$DAGodDetailedDebug ]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAGod -- Created Factory -- Faction: %s -- Ware: %s -- ModuleCount: %s -- Factory: %s(%s) -- Zone(Sector): %s(%s)'.[this.$DAGodLocFaction.id,this.$DAGodLocWare.id,this.$DAGodLocModCount,this.$DAGodLocFactory.knownname,this.$DAGodLocFactory.idcode,this.$DAGodLocZone.macro,this.$DAGodLocZone.sector.knownname]

'MOD: DAGod -- ERROR creating factory -- Faction: %s -- Ware: %s -- ModuleCount: %s -- Zone(Sector): %s(%s)'.[this.$DAGodLocFaction.id,this.$DAGodLocWare.id,this.$DAGodLocModCount,this.$DAGodLocZone.macro,this.$DAGodLocZone.sector.knownname]

set_value.name: this.$DAGodLocAllProduction
set_value.comment: All current and future production module macros

set_value.name: this.$DAGodLocAllStorage
set_value.comment: All current and future storage module macros

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAGod -- God upgrade started -- Faction: %s -- Ware: %s -- Station: %s(%s) - Sector: %s'.[parent.$DAGodLocFaction.id,parent.$DAGodLocWare.id,parent.$DAGodLocStation.knownname,parent.$DAGodLocStation.idcode,parent.$DAGodLocStation.sector.knownname]

set_value.name: $DADVT.$DAGodExcludedFactions
set_value.exact: [faction.civilian, faction.criminal, faction.khaak, faction.player, faction.smuggler, faction.visitor, faction.xenon]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAGod -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]
